documents.document: I both hate and want to adopt the kids on Masterchef Jr.

Penalty count is ridiculous. 15th penalty against Italy draws the yellow.
Eh? Not sure what this game is, it's supposed to be rugby but I'm not sure anyone told the officials!
If the ball is at the back of a crowd of Italians before we make contact, that's obstruction and not a maul?
Less than 5 minutes in and AWJ has gone off. Hopefully it's only bloods, but too soon for pessimism?
Ben Te'o example of why Sale prob win Denny Solomona case. League for Samoa & Union for England. Not saying it's right tho. #differentsport
Sco, Ire, Eng & Fra all playing with huge physicality & at high level in places. Slightly worried whether Wales can match them!
Don't mind taking the dog out for a walk when it's like this https://t.co/NLJGNbB9Em
Am i bad parent for saying to my child that the itching is caused by nits dropping number 2s on his head?

Boy now obsessed with Forged in Fire on History channel. Think it's either the smithing or the way Doug says "This blade will keeeell!"
@Philstips watch scarlets v ulster highlights. I take your ref and raise you Marius Mitrea. I've no idea who will or should have won.
@BBCScrumV @RugbyPodcast Let The Boys Play
Work trousers tomorrow for first time since Christmas break, this could all go bad pretty rapidly. #suspenseiskillingme
Caught up w/ @scarlets_rugby v @cardiff_blues after long day on road, Steff Evs improving at frightening rate & great 2 see ball in 2 hands!
@YellowTeamCDF v nice charizard you caught - excitingly i got one too, disappointingly less than 400 cp and stats not worth mentioning!
@YellowTeamCDF @Rowanjo18 @sean297297 @The_______Game been lucky fetching 2 10k eggs from tommy cooper statue in Caerphilly if that helps
I think i might respectfully disagree with the way the ref is making a few decisions here
A yellow for that? In a clean game when it start on the ball and slips upwards. Ridiculous.
Brisket. Nailed it even if i say so myself. Several hours later and a couple of kilos of meat later i can't eat any… https://t.co/Q9LUMxfzw8
Why did i decide on brisket for Xmas @hangfirebbq? Up half night struggling to keep temp in naughty smoker now deep in stall #hangtough #bbq
@richardosman child would like to know if you've done a pointless celebs champion of champions? If you haven't, it's one he'd like to see!
I say jeans a bit loose and need a belt. She then gives me lentil salad for lunch. What the hell?!
@RugbyPodcast if one thing is clear, no club has spoken to any player before January. Any insinuation otherwise is just plain wrong. FACT.
@Rowanjo18 @YellowTeamCDF @CdfPokemon by the farm and outside moody sow
So depressing. There's going to be Mary Poppins 2. Hollywood really has run out of new ideas #dontmesswithaclassic
@CdfPokemon @YellowTeamCDF looks like cefn mably is an exeggcute nest. Caught 3 in car park & 2 more nearby where you have to pay to go in
Rugby League noise whining about player leaving to Union. Newsflash: different sport, suck it. You made growing up in 80s and 90s miserable.
Christmas card from the kebab shop. Should i be worried about my lifestyle choices?
Safe to say I'm no friend of cellotape and it's no friend to me. #wrapping
@BBCfightingtalk in the season of goodwill to all men (and women), which sporting personality would you forget to extend it to?

All i want for Christmas is 1 day where we don't hear about any bloody reality tv people. Just for a day. Too much to ask?
@YellowTeamCDF have a worse wartortle than that to evolve - may hold off until i get one with better stats
@YellowTeamCDF loads of Squirtles earlier in Heath park, by pond, railway club and entrance. One walk through and i had 5!
@RugbyPodcast for interviews and press, surely Alfie Thomas? We've all got sources! https://t.co/or0EA68ctY
At the Good Neighbours In North Cardiff office right now. Looking so busy before Christmas - volunteers &/or donations desperately needed!
@YellowTeamCDF if i drive the long way home...
@YellowTeamCDF generally, but during week i commute to near (not in) Bristol so w/ends is when i get time
@YellowTeamCDF no luck with the lapras today, but barrage stuffed with geodudes - must have caught 5 or 6 on one walk along it
@YellowTeamCDF nice, will just have to be patient!
@YellowTeamCDF annonyingly no sign of chansey, hitmons, lapras, snorlax, aerodac, magmar etc so far, any ideas where (outside a 10k egg)?

Worst thing on @BBCScrumV was Howley saying players can enjoy Xmas now. Rob, the day jobs at clubs pay their wages? Have some respect!

Love the way Greggs sell Americano but the button on the machine says 'black coffee'.
Hope Liam Williams not going to Saracens for silly money. Doubt WRU will fork out for share of an NDC that big, even if that's on the table
Why on earth did i allow the wife to persuade me into watching The Raven? Not John Cusack's finest hour and a bit.
Thanks Wales team and coaching staff. That result made it feel like the 80s and 90s again. @BBCScrumV #WalvAus
Wales really need to start turning up. Don't want to single a player out but Aus obviously fancy attacking down Cuthbert's wing.

@Philstips you've got until 2018 to worry about that!
@Philstips consider what Eddie Jones likes in a 7, apply that to the likes of the Hask etc then compare and contrast. Not surprising really!
@Philstips Encyclopedic.
@Philstips That ain't no token. That's the Mighty Marius Mitrea. He's a strong part of why the pro12 is so well respected.
@Philstips Tavis has been released from Blues now with Newport, not quite the glorious return you hoped for!
So happy @scarlets_rugby broke run of results in Europe! Sarries away - tricky, but they're human too & everyone loses eventually #nofear
@Philstips skins? The shame... I hope the tour judge takes note.
That poem bloke in the @AskNationwide advert is getting right on my tits.
Not going to celebrate @scarlets_rugby v dragons until 10 minutes after final whistle just in case. #close
@scarlets_rugby ah buggeration. Maybe i need more despair in my life after all.
My motivational tweets to @scarlets_rugby clearly the reason for second half improvement. That or team's hard work and talent. Probably me.
More like it @scarlets_rugby! But still, 3 tries in first half hour by drags? More/better D pls. My blood pressure doesn't need it!
Oh ffs @scarlets_rugby.
Tough call to make. Do i go cucumber or lime with a little gin tonight?
@Jbeardmore i know you love a bit of pro12, but the Os v Cardiff is turning into a really entertaining game
@RugbyPodcast @Saracens @AndrewFenby would have had him back at @scarlets_rugby in a shot
My grandfather is not Ben Stiller. It's about the test.
https://t.co/7Z9OGNPcrr This test gave my father in law the chance to meet his grandson whilst still well enough to appreciate it.

Dudley Phillips stinking up the game. Both sides trying to play hard. Draw with 30 left, but Duds does like to blow #whistlehappy
